00009         BMcLAttitudeController::BMcLAttitudeController(ros::NodeHandle n)
00010         {
00011                 //Initialize states
00012                 tprev = ros::Time::now();
00013                 states.header.stamp = tprev;
00014                 altDes = 0;
00015 
00016                 //Subscribe and advertize
00017                 subInp = n.subscribe("rawPWM",1,&BMcLAttitudeController::getInput, this);
00018                 subState = n.subscribe("states",1,&BMcLAttitudeController::getStates, this);
00019                 subEnv = n.subscribe("environment",1,&BMcLAttitudeController::getEnvironment, this);
00020                 subRef = n.subscribe("refCommands",1,&BMcLAttitudeController::getReference, this);
00021                 pubCtrl = n.advertise<last_letter_msgs::SimPWM>("ctrlPWM",1000);
00022 
00023                 //Create roll to aileron controller
00024 
00025                 //Create yaw to roll controller
00026                 if(!ros::param::getCached("yaw2roll/p", P)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -yaw2roll/p- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00027                 if(!ros::param::getCached("yaw2roll/i", I)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -yaw2roll/i- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00028                 if(!ros::param::getCached("yaw2roll/d", D)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -yaw2roll/d- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00029                 if(!ros::param::getCached("yaw2roll/tau", Tau)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -yaw2roll/tau- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00030                 if(!ros::param::getCached("yaw2roll/max", satU)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -yaw2roll/max- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00031                 if(!ros::param::getCached("yaw2roll/min", satL)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -yaw2roll/min- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00032                 if(!ros::param::getCached("ctrlRate", Ts)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -ctrlRate- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00033                 Ts = 1.0/Ts;
00034                 yaw2Roll = new PID(P, I, D, satU, satL, 0.0, Ts, Tau);
00035 
00036                 //Create beta to rudder controller
00037                 if(!ros::param::getCached("beta2rud/p", P)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -beta2rud/p- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00038                 if(!ros::param::getCached("beta2rud/i", I)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -beta2rud/i- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00039                 if(!ros::param::getCached("beta2rud/d", D)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -beta2rud/d- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00040                 if(!ros::param::getCached("beta2rud/max", satU)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -beta2rud/max- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00041                 if(!ros::param::getCached("beta2rud/min", satL)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -beta2rud/min- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00042                 if(!ros::param::getCached("ctrlRate", Ts)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -ctrlRate- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00043                 Ts = 1.0/Ts;
00044                 Tau = 0.1;
00045                 beta2Rudder = new PID(P, I, D, satU, satL, 0.0, Ts, Tau);
00046 
00047                 //Create pitch to elevator controller
00048

00050                 if(!ros::param::getCached("alt2pitch/p", P)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -alt2pitch/p- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}

00053                 if(!ros::param::getCached("alt2pitch/max", satU)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -alt2pitch/max- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00054                 if(!ros::param::getCached("alt2pitch/min", satL)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -alt2pitch/min- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00055                 if(!ros::param::getCached("alt2pitch/tau", Tau)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -alt2pitch/tau- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00056                 if(!ros::param::getCached("ctrlRate", Ts)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -ctrlRate- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00057                 Ts = 1.0/Ts;
00058                 alt2Pitch = new PID(P, I, D, satU, satL, 0.0, Ts, Tau);
00059                 // alt2Pitch = new APID(P, I, D, satU, satL, 0.0, Ts, Tau);
00060 
00061                 //Create airspeed to pitch controller
00062                 if(!ros::param::getCached("airspd2pitch/p", P)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airspd2pitch/p- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00063                 if(!ros::param::getCached("airspd2pitch/i", I)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airspd2pitch/i- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}

00069                 Ts = 1.0/Ts;
00070                 airspd2Pitch = new PID(P, I, D, satU, satL, 0.0, Ts, Tau);
00071 
00072                 //Create airspeed to throttle controller
00073                 if(!ros::param::getCached("airspd2throt/p", P)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airspd2throt/p- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00074                 if(!ros::param::getCached("airspd2throt/i", I)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airspd2throt/i- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}

00076                 if(!ros::param::getCached("airspd2throt/tau", Tau)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airspd2throt/tau- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00077                 if(!ros::param::getCached("airspd2throt/max", satU)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airspd2throt/max- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}

00079                 if(!ros::param::getCached("airspd2throt/neutral", trim)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airspd2throt/neutral- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00080                 if(!ros::param::getCached("ctrlRate", Ts)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -ctrlRate- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00081                 Ts = 1.0/Ts;
00082                 airspd2Throt = new PID(P, I, D, satU, satL, trim, Ts, Tau);
00083 
00084                 int alphaOrder = 2;
00085                 int betaOrder = 1;
00086                 double alpha[] = {0.9751804568, -1.97502451};
00087                 double beta[] = {0.77646787e-4, 0.78300013e-4};
00088                 pitchSmoother = new discrTF(alpha, alphaOrder, beta, betaOrder);
00089         }

00095         BMcLAttitudeController::~BMcLAttitudeController() {

00102 
00104         //Lateral Controllers
00105         double BMcLAttitudeController::aileronControl() {
00106                 euler = quat2euler(states.pose.orientation);
00107                 double errYaw = refCommands.euler.z - euler.z;
00108                 double errRoll;
00109                 static double x1=0;
00110                 if (errYaw>M_PI) {errYaw-=2.0*M_PI;}
00111                 if (errYaw<-M_PI) {errYaw+=2.0*M_PI;}
00112                 double targetRoll = yaw2Roll->step(errYaw);
00113                 // errRoll =  refCommands.euler.x - euler.x;
00114                 errRoll = targetRoll - euler.x;
00115                 double errP = 2.0*errRoll - states.velocity.angular.x;
00116                 x1 += 0.01*6.325*errP;
00117                 return std::max(std::min(3.162*x1 + 2.0*errP -0.02*states.velocity.angular.x,1.0),-1.0);
00118         }
00119 
00120         double BMcLAttitudeController::rudderControl() {
00121                 // TODO: take accelerometer feedback
00122                 //read orientation and subtract gravity
00123                 double Reb[9];
00124                 quat2rotmtx(states.pose.orientation,Reb);
00125                 geometry_msgs::Vector3 gravVect;
00126                 gravVect.z = 9.8051;
00127                 geometry_msgs::Vector3 gravAcc = Reb/gravVect;
00128                 double accError = -states.acceleration.linear.y + gravAcc.y;
00129                 // std::cout << accError << std::endl;
00130                 // return std::max(std::min( -0.003*(states.acceleration.linear.y - gravAcc.y),1.0),-1.0);
00131                 return beta2Rudder->step( accError );
00132         }
00133 
00135         //Longitudinal Controllers
00136         double BMcLAttitudeController::elevatorControl() {
00137                 double static altPrev=0;
00138                 double static x1= 0;
00139                 double errAlt = refCommands.altitude - states.geoid.altitude;
00140                 double errVa = refCommands.airspeed - airdata.x;
00141 
00142                 double errPitch;
00143                 double refPitch;
00144                 double static sumErrAlt = 0, sumErrVa = 0, sumErrAlt2 = 0, sumErrVa2 = 0;
00145                 double errContr, contrOutput;
00146                 euler = quat2euler(states.pose.orientation);
00147 
00148                 double comRate = (refCommands.altitude - states.geoid.altitude)/5.0; // Using exponential profile
00149                 comRate = std::min(2.8, std::max(comRate, -3.0));
00150                 double climbRate = (states.geoid.altitude - altPrev)/0.01;
00151                 altPrev = states.geoid.altitude;
00152                 double errRate = comRate - climbRate;
00153                 refPitch = alt2Pitch->step(errRate);
00154                 errContr = errPitch - airspd2Pitch->step(errVa);
00155                 sumErrVa += errContr*0.01;
00156                 sumErrVa2 += sumErrVa*0.01;
00157                 airspd2Pitch->Iterm += (10*errContr + 10*sumErrVa + 10*sumErrVa2)*0.01;
00158 
00159                 errPitch = refPitch - euler.y;
00160                 // errPitch =  refCommands.euler.y - euler.y;
00161                 //
00162                 // Compensator scheme based on Stevens/Lewis
00163                 x1 += 0.01*0.9493*errPitch;
00164                 return std::max(std::min(1.1878*x1 + 5.0*errPitch -0.6*states.velocity.angular.y,1.0),-1.0);
00165         }
00166 
00167         double BMcLAttitudeController::throttleControl() {
00168                 double errAlt = refCommands.altitude - states.geoid.altitude;
00169                 double static deltat;
00170 
00171                 double errVa = refCommands.airspeed - airdata.x;
00172                 deltat = airspd2Throt->step( errVa);
00173                 // double forwarddelta = 0.00151*pow(refCommands.airspeed,2) -0.0896*refCommands.airspeed + 1.703;
00174                 // std::cout<< deltat <<',' << forwarddelta << ','<< refCommands.airspeed << std::endl;
00175                 // deltat += forwarddelta;
00176                 // deltat = std::max(std::min(deltat,1.0),0.0);
00177                 return deltat;
00178         }

00180 
00182         // Main Step
00183         void BMcLAttitudeController::step()
00184         {
00185                 euler = quat2euler(states.pose.orientation);
00186                 geometry_msgs::Vector3 temp;
00187                 temp.x = states.velocity.linear.x - environment.wind.x;
00188                 temp.y = states.velocity.linear.y - environment.wind.y;
00189                 temp.z = states.velocity.linear.z - environment.wind.z;
00190                 airdata = getAirData(temp);
00191                 double output[4];
00192                 output[0] = aileronControl();
00193                 output[1] = elevatorControl();
00194                 output[2] = throttleControl();
00195                 output[3] = rudderControl();
00196                 writePWM(output);
00197         }

00203         void BMcLAttitudeController::getStates(last_letter_msgs::SimStates inpStates)
00204         {
00205                 states = inpStates;
00206         }
00207 
00209         //convert uS PPM values to control surface inputs
00210         void BMcLAttitudeController::getInput(last_letter_msgs::SimPWM inputMsg)
00211         {
00212                 //Convert PPM to -1/1 ranges (0/1 for throttle)
00213                 input[0] = (double)(inputMsg.value[0]-1500)/500;
00214                 input[1] = (double)(inputMsg.value[1]-1500)/500;
00215                 input[2] = (double)(inputMsg.value[2]-1000)/1000;
00216                 input[3] = (double)(inputMsg.value[3]-1500)/500;
00217                 input[9] = (double)(inputMsg.value[9]-1000)/1000;
00218         }
00219 
00220         void BMcLAttitudeController::writePWM(double *output)
00221         {
00222                 last_letter_msgs::SimPWM channels;
00223                 channels.value[0] = (unsigned int)(output[0]*500+ 1500);
00224                 channels.value[1] = (unsigned int)(output[1]*500+ 1500);
00225                 channels.value[2] = (unsigned int)((output[2])*1000+ 1000);
00226                 channels.value[3] = (unsigned int)(output[3]*500+ 1500);
00227                 channels.value[9] = (unsigned int)(input[9]*1000 + 1000);
00228                 channels.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00229                 pubCtrl.publish(channels);
00230         }

00247 //Main function
00249 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00250 {
00251 
00252         ros::init(argc, argv, "controlNode");
00253         ros::NodeHandle n;
00254 
00255         ros::Duration(3).sleep(); //wait for other nodes to get raised
00256         double ctrlRate;
00257         ros::param::get("ctrlRate",ctrlRate); //frame rate in Hz
00258         ros::Rate spinner(ctrlRate);
00259 
00260         BMcLAttitudeController attCtrl(n);
00261         spinner.sleep();
00262         ROS_INFO("controlNode up");
00263 
00264         while (ros::ok())
00265         {
00266                 ros::spinOnce();
00267                 attCtrl.step();
00268                 spinner.sleep();
00269 
00270 //              if (isnan(uav.states.velocity.linear.x))
00271 //              {
00272 //                      ROS_FATAL("State NAN!");
00273 //                      break;
00274 //              }
00275         }
00276 
00277         return 0;
00278 
00279 }
